VR&E Services Eligibility for Service Members
Effective February 10, 2012, in accordance with
Public Law (PL)
110-181, Section 1631(b)
, and as rendered permanent by
PL
115-251, Section 126
, severely ill or injured service members that have been referred to a military Physical Evaluation Board (PEB) or are participating in the Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) may be eligible for VR&E services without obtaining a VA disability rating.
Service members pending medical separation from active duty, who have not been referred to a PEB or are not participating in IDES may apply, but the disability rating must be
at least
20 percent.
